channel.description: Latest Health News and Medical News posted throughout the day, every day.
channel.title: Abortion News From Medical News Today

item.title: Modern Methods Of Abortion Are Not Linked With An Increased Risk Of Preterm Birth
item.description: The link between previous termination of pregnancy (abortion) and preterm delivery in a subsequent pregnancy has disappeared over the last 20-30 years, according to a study of data from Scotland published in this week's PLOS Medicine...
